Enhanced Admin Theme

From the makers of
AdeshSuryan

Features

Change Admin Theme: As you know we can change the front-end theme any time from admin ( in Design setting ). But some time we needs some modification in admin theme. For this purpose you can use this extension .

Installation Instructions

Just follow below steps one by one :

  1. Copy the all folder and contents from "Default" folder ( check the below path ) . Create a custom folder like as admin_custom theme and past all contents in this folder . Path : app/design/adminhtml/default/
  2. Copy the all folder and contents from skin "Default" folder ( check the below path ) . Create a custom folder like as admin_custom theme and past all contents in this folder . Path : skin/adminhtml/default/
  3. Clear all Cache and locks from Var folder . If you are login in admin then logout from admin and clean cache again .
  4. Check the admin theme setting form below section . System->Configuration->Design -> Admin Theme
  5. Update theme name from new admin theme like as admin_custom .
